resources.string: NCT DREAM ALBUM GLITCH MODE SEALED (GLITCH VER dan SCRATCH VER)
Album NCT DREAM (GLITCH MODE) berisi Photobook, sticker random 1 pcs, postcard random 1 pcs, photocard set 1 type for each version, lentucular card random 1 pcs, folded poster
READY STOK, NO POSTER, Price include packing (Harga sudah termasuk packing bubble wrap + polymailer/polymer plastic), Freebies snack

READY STOK, NO POSTER, Price include packing (Harga sudah termasuk packing bubble wrap + polymailer/polymer plastic), Freebies snack

Album NCT 2021 (UNIVERSE) berisi Photobook, sticker random 1 pcs, postcard random 1 pcs, photocard set 1 type for each version, lentucular card random 1 pcs, folded poster
